to.sven.androidrccar.host.service.contract

Interface IHostConfigurationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HostConfigurationService

    public interface IHostConfigurationService
    Provides access to the configuration of the Host application.
    Author:
    sven

        Is sharing the location with the client allowed?
        Returns:

        boolean canRotateCamera()
        Is rotation of the camera allowed? (Can only true if shareCamera() is enabled.)
        Returns:
